articles.title: DPRK NDC Reiterates Its Stand to Fight It Out against U.S. and S. Korean Regime
articles.content:
DPRK NDC Reiterates Its Stand to Fight It Out against U.S. and S. Korean Regime 
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK issued the following statement Tuesday:
					 The south Korean puppet regime finally made public so-called new "missile policy declaration" on October 7. It has so far been locked in the confab for the "revision of missile guidelines" with the U.S. for a long time despite big concerns and opposition of the public at home and abroad.
					
					 The declaration envisages extending the firing range of south Korea's missiles to 800 km capable of attacking the entire region of the DPRK from the previous 300 km, increasing the weight of warheads to over 500 kg when necessary and even equipping the army with new lethal unmanned assaulters 2.5t in weight and 300km in cruising range.
					
					 The south Korean regime let officials of Chongwadae and "Defense Ministry" speak loudly that the new "missile policy declaration" will make it possible to satisfactorily deter "threat" and "provocation" of the DPRK and to affect the northeastern area of China and even the far eastern region of Russia, to say nothing of the whole area of the DPRK with a missile fired from Taejon and other middle areas of south Korea.
					
					 The "missile policy declaration" which the regime calls "the biggest achievement" it gained from its American master in recent years is a product of another conspiracy of the master and the stooge to push the situation on the Korean Peninsula to the extreme pitch of tension and ignite a war against the DPRK any moment.
					
					 Demand for the declaration raised by Chongwadae and the "Defense Ministry" and "Foreign Affairs and Trade Ministry" of south Korea was accepted by the White House, U.S. Defense Department and State Department. U.S. President Obama also responded to the imploration made by traitor Lee Myung Bak. 
					
					 Lee Myung Bak required Obama to extend the firing range of missiles on scores of occasions typically in last July and this March.
					
					 No sooner had south Korea made public the "missile policy declaration" under the scenario worked out by it than the Obama administration expressed its official stand by praising it as the most balanced and clear counteraction and absolutely appropriate measure.
					
					 Under the prevailing situation the National Defence Commission of the DPRK clarifies its principled stand as follows: 
					
					 Firstly, the army and people of the DPRK will fight it out to put into practice the slogan "Annihilate the U.S. imperialists, sworn enemy of the Korean people!", given that the U.S. hostile policy has become clearer through south Korea's "missile policy declaration".
					
					 It was only shortly ago that President Obama openly clarified his stand to exist in peace with the DPRK. State Secretary Hillary also expressed the same stand. Leading policy-makers of the U.S. National Security Council and Central Intelligence Agency said the U.S. does not have hostile policy toward the DPRK when they had official and unofficial meetings with DPRK officials.
					
					 But the situation gives the lie to all the U.S. messages.
					
					 Given the clarity being added to the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK, the army and people of the DPRK are of the fixed stand that they can not stop the final battle with the U.S. for settling accounts with their sworn enemy for whom they bear great grudge.
					
					 The south Korean puppet regime will not be able to find a room for hiding as it blindly follows its master's ambition for aggression, being steeped in sycophancy and submission.
					
					 Secondly, now that the south Korean puppet regime is seeking attacking the whole area of the DPRK by missiles at the instigation of its master, the army and people of the DPRK will bolster military preparedness in every way to cope with it.
					
					 We do not hide that the revolutionary armed forces of Mt. Paektu including the strategic rocket forces are keeping within the scope of strike not only the bases of the puppet forces and the U.S. imperialist aggression forces' bases in the inviolable land of Korea but also Japan, Guam and the U.S. mainland.
					
					 The DPRK is prepared to counter nuclear attack and missile attack of the U.S., south Korea and all other following forces in kind.
					
					 What remains to be done now is the DPRK's resolute action.
					
					 It is the strong will of its army and people to let them feel the real taste of a war.
					
					 Thirdly, we would like to take this opportunity to appeal to the governments, political parties, organizations and peace-loving people of all countries around the world that value justice and sympathize with truth to heighten vigilance against the U.S. arbitrary practices.
					
					 The "missile policy declaration" which the south Korean regime made public in conspiracy with the U.S. is not simple missile range extension guidelines.
					
					 Lurking behind this is the U.S. sinister domination aim to lay strategic siege network to Asia and upset peace and stability in the region and thus establish the U.S. hegemony in the Asia-Pacific region.
					
					 Still lots of world people have failed to realize the U.S. arbitrary trick behind situations in Iraq, Afghanistan, Libya and Syria.
					
					 Now is the time to heighten vigilance against the U.S. arbitrary practices and turn out in actions to frustrate them.
					
					 We should not forget even a moment that wolf never subsists on grass as long as it breathes.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will as before hold high the banner of struggle against the U.S. and south Korean puppet forces and wage dynamic actions to achieve the country's reunification and the world independence.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Reply Messages to Party Leaders and Heads of State of Various Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Reply Messages to Party, State Leaders of Various Countries
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, sent messages to party leaders and heads of state of various countries in reply to their congratulatory messages and letters on the occasion of the 64th anniversary of the DPRK.
					 They included the president of China who is also the general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and the chairman of the Central Military Commission of China, the chairman of the Standing Committee of the Chinese National People's Congress, the premier of the State Council of China, the president of the Council of Ministers of Cuba who is also the first secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Cuba and the president of the Council of State of Cuba, the president of Nepal, the president of Laos who is general secretary of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party, the presidents of Lebanon, Maldives, Myanmar and Mongolia, the king of Bahrain, the presidents of Bangladesh, Syria and Sri Lanka, the king of Cambodia, the emir and the prime minister of Kuwait, the king of Thailand, the president of Palestine who is the chairman of the Executive Committee of the Palestine Liberation Organization and the chief o
					
					 f the Palestinian National Authority, the emir of Qatar, its prime minister who is also the foreign minister, presidents of Cyprus, Tajikistan, Turkmenistan, Armenia, Azerbaijan, the sultan of Oman, the king of the Hashemite Kingdom of Jordan, the presidents of Indonesia, India, Yemen, Greece, Malta, Belarus and Portugal, the captains regent of San Marino, the king of Spain, the presidents of Guinea and Namibia, the president of Nigeria and its commander-in-chief of the Armed Forces, the president of Rwanda, the prime minister of Lesotho, the presidents of Mali, Mozambique, Sao Tome and Principe, Sudan, Sierra Leone, Senegal, Seychelles, Equatorial Guinea, the Central African Republic, Zimbabwe, Chad, Kenya, Tanzania, Comoros, Cote d'Ivoire, Congo, Democratic Congo, Togo, Tunisia, Algeria, Angola, Uganda, Egypt, Ethiopia and Suriname.
					
					 Among them are also the UN general secretary, the director-general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea (IIJI) who is also secretary general of the International Council of Kim Il Sung Prize, the co-chairman of the Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation and the secretary general of the IIJI.
					
					 Kim Jong Un in his messages expressed thanks to them for sending him warm congratulations and best wishes.
					
					 He also wished them success in their work, expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative ties between the DPRK and those countries would steadily and favorably develop.

articles.title: Mangyongdae and Taesongsan Funfairs Opened
articles.content:
Mangyongdae and Taesongsan Funfairs Opened
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- The Mangyongdae Funfair and the Taesongsan Funfair underwent drastic changes into people's cultural recreation grounds in the run-up to the 67th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The funfairs originally built under the warm care of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il have now changed into edifices representing the era thanks to the noble love for people of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un who regards the people's interests and convenience as a top priority.
					
					 Opening ceremonies took place at the funfairs on Tuesday.
					
					 Present there were Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim, Choe Ryong Hae and other senior officials, officials of the armed forces organs, ministries and national institutions, solider-builders, employees of the institutions for funfair facilities management and Pyongyang citizens.
					
					 Vice Marshal of the Korean People's Army Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee and director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, made an opening address at the ceremony held at the Mangyongdae Funfair.
					
					 He said the Mangyongdae Funfair was wonderfully rebuilt thanks to the energetic leadership of Kim Jong Un, who is possessed of noble outlook on the country, people and rising generations, and thanks to the spirit of thoroughly carrying out his instructions, patriotism and loyalty of the revolutionary army that heartily responds to the party's calls.
					
					 The speaker called on officials and employees of the Mangyongdae Funfair Management Institution to bring about a turn in operating the funfair and make good inspection and management of its facilities so as to contribute to providing the people with pleasant time.
					
					 At the ceremony held at the Taesongsan Funfair, Vice Marshal of the KPA Kim Jong Gak, member of the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee and minister of the People's Armed Forces, made an opening speech.
					
					 Kim said the Taesongsan Funfair changed its contents and style in line with the growing requirements of the people for better cultural and emotional life while preserving its peculiar characters, adding it is another edifice that embodies the WPK's deep love of the people.
					
					 The renovation of the funfair showed the true picture of Korean-style socialism that advances towards the world to realize the people's ideals, and will enable the people to lead a more rich cultural and emotional life.
					
					 After the ceremonies, the participants looked round the funfairs.

articles.title: Order of Kim Jong Il to Mangyongdae Revolutionary School
articles.content:
Order of Kim Jong Il to Mangyongdae Revolutionary School 
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Order of Kim Jong Il was awarded to Mangyongdae Revolutionary School which is greeting its 65th anniversary.
					 True to the Workers' Party of Korea's policy of educating bereaved children, the school thoroughly established the commanding system of the dear respected Supreme Commander and laid a firm material and technological foundation for education. It made distinguished contributions to glorifying the undying feats of the three commanders of Mt. Paektu forever and training its students to be reliable successors to the revolutionary cause of Juche through substantial teaching and education.
					
					 A decree on awarding the order was released by the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK on Sept. 29.

articles.title: Pak Ui Chun Meets Nigerian Government Delegation
articles.content:
Pak Ui Chun Meets Nigerian Government Delegation
DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun met and had a talk with the Nigerian government delegation led by Viola Onwuliri, minister of State for Foreign Affairs, who paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Tuesday.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Congratulatory Message from Syrian President
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Congratulatory Message from Syrian President 
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, received a congratulatory message from Bashar Al-Assad, president of the Syrian Arab Republic who is regional secretary of the Arab Baath Socialist Party, on October 7. 
					 Bashar Al-Assad in the message said that it is his pleasure to extend the sincerest congratulations to Kim Jong Un and his friendly people in the name of the Syrian Arab people and on his behalf on the occasion of the 67th anniversary of the WPK. He wished Kim Jong Un good health and the Korean people greater progress and prosperity. 
					
					 Availing himself of the opportunity, he expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the Syrian Arab Republic and the Democratic People's Republic of Korea will grow stronger in the interests of the peoples of the two friendly countries.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Floral Basket from Chinese
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Floral Basket from Chinese
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un Tuesday was presented with a floral basket by the family of Zhang Weihua, Chinese anti-Japanese revolutionary martyr, on the occasion of the 67th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from Chinese Delegation
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from Chinese Delegation 
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un was presented with a gift by the visiting delegation of the China Institute of Contemporary International Relations.
					 The Head of the delegation Cui Liru who is president of the institute handed over the gift to an official concerned on Tuesday.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Laotian President
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Laotian President
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un was presented with a floral basket by Laotian President Choummaly Sayasone, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party, on the occasion of the 67th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The floral basket was conveyed to Kim Yong Il, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the WPK, by Laotian Ambassador to the DPRK Kiettisak Keobanhdith on Tuesday.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Floral Baskets and Congratulatory Messages
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Floral Baskets and Congratulatory Messages
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un Tuesday was presented with a floral basket and a congratulatory message from the diplomatic corps here on the occasion of the 67th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The basket and the message were delivered to Kim Yong Il, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the WPK, by Doyens of the corps Chhorn Hay, Cambodian ambassador, and Liu Hongcai, Chinese ambassador.
					
					 Kim Jong Un was presented with floral baskets and congratulatory messages by the Cambodian ambassador and Brazilian Ambassador Roberto Colin and congratulatory letters by Egyptian Ambassador Iman Mostafa Abdou Ahmed and Syrian Charge d’Affaires ad Interim Haissam Saad on the same day.

articles.title: Floral Basket to WPK from CPC
articles.content:
Floral Basket to WPK from CPC
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Communist Party of China sent a floral basket to the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, congratulating WPK on its 67th birthday.
					 It was handed over to an official concerned by Chinese Ambassador to the DPRK Liu Hongcai on Tuesday.
					
					 A floral basket was also presented to the C.C., the WPK in the name of the Chinese embassy here.

articles.title: Members of Office of UNICEF Pay Floral Tribute to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Members of Office of UNICEF Pay Floral Tribute to    Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Members of the Office of the UNICEF here visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and   General Secretary Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Tuesday on the occasion of the 67th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 They laid a floral basket before the statues before paying tribute to them.

articles.title: Mosaics Depicting Great Leaders Erected at Several Units
articles.content:
Mosaics Depicting Great Leaders Erected at Several Units
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Mosaics depicting the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu "The great leader Comrade Kim Il Sung will always be with us" and "The great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il will always be with us" were erected in Sariwon City of North Hwanghae Province and Hamhung City, South Hamgyong Province.
					 Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il visited North Hwanghae Province and South Hamgyong Province many times, indicating the way for them to follow and wisely leading their drive for bringing about a turn in economic construction and in the improvement of the people's standard of living.
					
					 The officials and working people in Sariwon City and Hamhung city built the mosaics in a short period with a single mind to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche holding in high esteem the peerlessly great persons forever, true to the leadership of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 A mosaic erected at the Myonggan Fruit Farm depicted Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il with a broad smile against the background of edifices of the era of the Workers' Party of Korea. The mosaic is called "My great country, my homeland, do prosper forever!"
					
					 The workers of the Kaechon Coal Mine built the mosaic "The great leader Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il among coal miners" to show the leadership personalities of the peerlessly great persons who were so considerate for the country's coal production.
					
					 The mosaic erected on the Koup Cooperative Farm in Kangnam County portrays the benevolent images of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il taking a view of the field of good harvest with sunny smiles.
					
					 Officials and working people in Kaechon City and Tukjang District displayed their loyalty in building mosaics with earnest longing for Kim Jong Il who devoted his all to the prosperity of the country and the happiness of the people.
					
					 There were unveiling ceremonies.

articles.title: Kyodo News Delegation Arrives
articles.content:
Kyodo News Delegation Arrives 
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Kyodo News of Japan led by its President Satoshi Ishikawa arrived here on Tuesday. 
					 It was greeted at the airport by Vice Director General of KCNA Chon Il.

articles.title: Seminar Marks Anniversary of October 4 Declaration
articles.content:
Seminar Marks Anniversary of October 4 Declaration 
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- There took place at the Koryo compatriots' hall in Pyongyang on Oct. 8 a seminar to mark the fifth anniversary of the historic October 4 Declaration.
					 Present there were Ri Chung Bok, vice-chairman of the North Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration, and other members of the committee and officials concerned and Yun Kil Sang, chairman of the Federation of Koreans in the U.S., and compatriots from the U.S., Canada, Japan, China and Australia.
					
					 Korean resident in the U.S. Ro Kil Nam, who is representative of an Internet paper Minjok Thongsin, expressed the belief that the seminar would contribute to hastening the reunification of the country by implementing the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					 Ri Chung Bok in a report noted that the publication of the October 4 declaration was a precious fruition of the noble patriotic intention and tireless efforts of General Secretary Kim Jong Il and it was another great event to be specially recorded in the history of the national reunification movement.
					
					 He declared the compatriots in the north, true to the noble intention of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un, would join hands with bodies of people from all walks of life and figures supporting the inter-Korean declarations and wishing to achieve the independent reunification in the idea of "By our nation itself!"
					
					 The participants in the seminar heard speeches made on different subjects. Speakers said that the adoption of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration was a great event which brought about an epochal turn in the effort for national reunification and the development of the north-south relations. They also referred to the obstacle to the implementation of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and tasks and ways for implementing those declarations.
					
					 They called upon all the Koreans in the north, the south and overseas to strive to reunify the country by pooling efforts, fully aware that they are the masters of their destinies.

articles.title: Meari Sound Devices Popular among Music Fans
articles.content:
Meari Sound Devices Popular among Music Fans
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Karaoke, high-performance microphone and other Meari-trademarked sound devices manufactured in the DPRK won a high appreciation at the recent 8th Pyongyang Autumn International Trade Fair.
					 The new-type karaoke device, developed on the basis of the latest technology, can be played with TV set only. It is possible to add music videos to the device.
					
					 It can be used by two persons at the same time with auxiliary microphone.
					
					 Recorded in it are more than 1,700 music videos.
					
					 Kim Il Ryong, president of the Meari Company in Rangnang District, Pyongyang, told KCNA:
					
					 "Wireless and wire microphones produced by our company are high in quality and diverse in type and kind.
					
					 Our sound devices are also well received in foreign markets. They won gold prize and gold-silver prize at international exhibitions of inventions and new technologies held in Geneva and the 2004 best invention prize of the World Intellectual Property Organization. In particular the demand for high-performance microphones is growing in other countries.
					
					 The company has recently developed a high-tech automatic fire alarm system."

articles.title: 32nd Anniversary of Proposal for Founding DFRK Observed
articles.content:
DFRK Founding Proposal Serves as Great Political Charter for Korean Reunification 
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- 32 years have passed since President Kim Il Sung put forward the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo (DFRK). 
					 The proposal is the most just proposal for the reunification of Korea as it fully reflects the ardent desire of all Koreans for early reunification of the country and the specific conditions of the north and the south. 
					
					 The proposal for achieving reunification by federal formula on the basis of one nation, one state, two systems and two governments is the most just great charter for national reunification suited to the actual conditions of Korea. 
					
					 The proposal calls for founding a federal republic through the establishment of a unified national government on the condition that the north and the south recognize and tolerate each other's ideologies and social systems, a government in which the two sides are represented on an equal footing and under which they exercise regional autonomy with equal rights and duties. 
					
					 This proposal serves as a blueprint indicating all aspects of a unified state and ways for its fulfillment. 
					
					 It defines the organization of the federal state and principles for building it, the distribution of authority and its duties, character and nomenclature of a unified state, its external position, etc. to meet the common desire and wishes of the north and the south. 
					
					 It is the most reasonable and just proposal which can be supported and accepted by anyone who loves the nation and hopes for the reunification of the country irrespective of his idea, political view and religious belief and regardless of whether one is in the north or in the south. 
					
					 The proposal defines the 10-point program to be implemented by a federal state according to the character and mission of a national unified state and interests and wishes of all Koreans. 
					
					 It is a signpost of hope for the Korean nation that has undergone trials and twists and turns owing to the protracted division. 
					
					 It is a patriotic charter for reunification provided by President Kim Il Sung with great thought and devotion and a noble legacy for reunification bequeathed by him to the whole nation. 
					
					 There are temporary difficulties lying in the way of accomplishing the cause of independent reunification of the nation due to the anti-reunification moves of the present south Korean conservative regime but the prospect for national reunification remains bright as long as the proposal for founding the DFRK is deeply enshrined in the hearts of the Koreans as a way of reunification common to the nation and the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration serve as a clear landmark for its implementation.

articles.title: KCNA Slams Reckless Remarks of Lee Myung Bak and Brass Hats of S. Korea
articles.content:
KCNA Slams Reckless Remarks of Lee Myung Bak and Brass Hats of S. Korea
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors in south Korea is becoming evermore hysteric in its war drumbeat. 
					 Lee Myung Bak and brass hats of south Korea vied with each other to cry out for "strong retaliation" and "punishment" of "provocation" from the north. They are now busy conducting diplomacy in the international arena to build up public opinion on this and fan up the atmosphere of confrontation with the DPRK. 
					
					 This is nothing but the last-ditch effort of those in the grip of the worst ruling crisis, badly beaten by the toughest retaliatory offensive of the DPRK. 
					
					 It is a trite method employed by the successive puppet ruling quarters of south Korea to invent a pretext for making provocations and stoke the atmosphere of confrontation, vociferating about the non-existent "threat of southward invasion" and "north wind" whenever they faced a ruling crisis. 
					
					 As a matter of fact, the Lee group is now more dead than alive as politicians due to the total failure of its domestic and foreign policies. 
					
					 Lee has pursued sycophantic and treacherous policies, letting loose sophism "no south Korea without U.S." and "south Korea can achieve prosperity only under the U.S. patronage." This has put the south Korean people's living into destitution and driven the inter-Korean relations into the lowest ebb. 
					
					 It is by no means fortuitous that south Koreans from all walks of life are calling for toppling the present regime and bringing about a policy switchover, terming the politics pursued by Lee over the last five years "failed politics" and "politics leaving nothing to be reviewed." Such open derision and negative comment are being manifested among even ruling quarters of south Korea and U.S. and Japanese masters. 
					
					 Lee and his clan are finding themselves in a bottomless quagmire due to the continued disclosure of hideous scandals committed by them. 
					
					 He is now seized with utter uneasiness as he is suffering from the nightmare that he may be beaten to death any time in these remaining days of his office for so many crimes committed by him. 
					
					 His group is orchestrating deliberate and premeditated provocations in a bid to weather its worst crisis. It is keen to extremely rattle the nerves of the DPRK and spark off such shocking incidents as armed conflict in an effort to seek a pretext for keeping afloat the conservative regime, its last stronghold. 
					
					 That is why the group is trumpeting about "insecurity" and "north's interference in the presidential election of south Korea". It is, at the same time, unprecedentedly beefing up its armed forces in the biggest hotspot in the West Sea of Korea and crying out for "strengthened alert posture" while touring the frontline areas. 
					
					 However, the group should bear in mind its desperate efforts in the abyss of ruin would only put its fate at greater peril. 
					
					 Moreover, nobody in the world would be taken in by its worn-out method of provocation. 
					
					 The reckless military moves of the Lee group would help all Koreans and the international community clearly see who is the provocateur and from where the danger of a war is coming. 
					
					 The Lee group's outdated "fiction about threat from the north" and provocations would only precipitate its doomsday.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Brands U.S. as Worst Human Rights Abuser
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Brands U.S. as Worst Human Rights Abuser 
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- The true colors of the United States as the worst human rights abuser are being brought to bolder relief as the days go by. 
					 According to a recent survey report issued by Stanford University and New York University in the U.S., the U.S. drone attack left more than 3 000 people killed and over 1 300 wounded in Pakistan. Terrorists killed in the attack accounted for just two percent of the death toll.
					
					 This is unpardonable state-sponsored terrorism and massacre of civilians, product of the extreme arrogance and barbarism of the U.S. whose job is to invade and interfere in other countries.
					
					 The U.S. has justified its drone attacks perpetrated under the signboard of "anti-terrorism", asserting they are not contrary to international law but high-precision surgical attacks. 
					
					 However, international law does not have any provision allowing killing of civilians after trespassing on the border of any other country which is not a belligerent party.
					
					 The hypocrisy of such high-precision surgical attack has already been disclosed.
					
					 The U.S. has employed such human scum crazy for moneymaking for leading drone attacks to "precision ones." Its agents are forcing those informers to install infrared devices at civilian houses in return for money.
					
					 A Pakistani boy confessed in April 2009 that he was paid for placing an infrared device at a house which had nothing to do with terrorism.
					
					 All facts go to prove that the U.S.-led "war on terrorism" is nothing but operations which seriously abuse the human rights.
					
					 The U.S. "war on terrorism" by drones is the height of barbarity.
					
					 The U.S. army watching and controlling drones through video footages from the mainland first mounts a missile attack and then makes attacks on civilians when they scour dead bodies in ruins, massacring innocent civilians.
					
					 The present U.S. administration increased the number of drone attacks four times as compared with that in the period of the Bush administration.
					
					 It is steadily escalating killings of civilians in Pakistan, Afghanistan, Yemen, Somalia and other countries and regions.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists dropped nuclear bombs on Japan during World War II and germ bombs on the territory of the DPRK, brutally killing civilians.
					
					 The ongoing U.S. massacre of civilians is the most hideous crime against humanity that can be perpetrated only by the human butchers who carried forward their man-killing methods.
					
					 The U.S. is the chieftain of man-killing and the worst human rights abuser.
					
					 The U.S. human rights abuses perpetrated in different parts of the world under the signboard of "war on terrorism" have drawn strong protests from the international community.
					
					 An international meeting in Geneva in June seriously discussed human rights abuses committed by the U.S. through drone attacks.
					
					 In September, the supreme court of Italy supported the decision made by a lower court that sentenced to prison terms CIA agents who abducted an innocent Egyptian on suspected terrorism.
					
					 With nothing can the U.S. cover up its true colors as a criminal country.
					
					 The U.S. will have to pay a dear price for its serious human rights abuses committed in utter disregard of international law, cursed and denounced by world justice and conscience.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Achieving Reunification by Federal Formula
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Achieving Reunification by Federal Formula 
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- All Koreans at home and abroad will resolutely reject any attempt to escalate the confrontation of the social systems quite contrary to the proposal for achieving reunification by federal formula and wage a dynamic struggle to achieve the reunification of the country and prosperity common to the nation on the basis of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration. Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says this in a bylined article. 
					 The article goes on:
					
					 All Koreans are convinced that to achieve reunification by federal formula is the only way for peacefully reunifying the country in line with the nation's will and interests. 
					
					 President Kim Il Sung put forward the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo at the 6th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea on Oct. 10, 1980. 
					
					 The proposal calls on the north and the south to reunify the country by founding a federal republic through the establishment of a unified national government on the condition that they recognize and tolerate each other's ideologies and social systems, and set up a government under which the two sides exercise regional autonomy. 
					
					 The proposal is a great programme common to the nation for achieving the peaceful reunification of the country by the concerted efforts of the nation. 
					
					 The nation can achieve independent reunification, peace and prosperity, its cherished desire, only when it realizes reunification by federal formula. 
					
					 If national reunification is achieved by federal formula, the Korean nation will establish sovereignty throughout Korea and realize great unity as a homogeneous nation and the country will emerge an independent, peace-loving national unified state. The reunified federal state will not violate the interests of the neighboring countries. 
					
					 Reunification by federal formula will contribute to defusing the constant danger of war prevailing on the Korean Peninsula and ensuring peace and security in Northeast Asia. 
					
					 Federal formula will always remain the only way of achieving peaceful reunification no matter how the situation and circumstances may change.

articles.title: Minju Joson Slams U.S.-S. Korea Negotiations for Amending "Missile Pact"
articles.content:
Minju Joson Slams U.S.-S. Korea Negotiations for Amending "Missile Pact"
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- The puppet authorities of south Korea on Oct. 7 made public the results of the negotiations which had been under way with the U.S. over the issue of amending the "missile pact" since January of last year.  
					 According to it, they agreed with the U.S. to radically extend the missile range up to 800 km and increase the weight of warheads for shorter range missiles.
					
					 Minju Joson on Tuesday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard: 
					
					 The above-said negotiations were a criminal confab held between the U.S. and the south Korean puppet group to further hasten the preparations for invading the north.
					
					 The U.S. scenario for invading the DPRK remains unchanged, the commentary notes, adding:
					
					 The U.S. could not ignite a war against the DPRK because of its bolstered nuclear deterrent for self-defence.
					
					 Hence, the U.S. is keen to use the south Korean puppet troops as cannon fodder to decrease its casualties in the event of a war against the DPRK.
					
					 That is why the U.S. sells modern weaponry to the south Korean regime at cheap prices and stages various forms of DPRK-targeted war drills with the puppet army.
					
					 What should not be overlooked is the fact that Chongwadae directly spearheaded the negotiations.
					
					 As seen above, the Lee Myung Bak group is getting crazy for a preemptive attack on the DPRK, backed by the U.S.
					
					 If the U.S. and south Korean forces attempt at a preemptive attack on the DPRK, its one-beats-a-hundred armed forces will blow up the strongholds for aggression with resolute and merciless strikes, warns the article.

articles.title: Minju Joson Slams Japan's Moves to Turn SDF into War Forces for Aggression
articles.content:
Minju Joson Slams Japan's Moves to Turn SDF into War Forces for Aggression 
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Recently the Japanese reactionaries organized on Guam a joint drill of the unit of the Japan "Self-Defense Forces" in the Western region in charge of Kyushu and Okinawa with expedition forces of the Third U.S. Marines stationed in Okinawa.
					 Meanwhile, Japan's former Prime Minister Abe asserted that Japan needs to have a new unit capable of rapid deployment like U.S. Marines and it is required to have Japanese marines for defence and so on.
					
					 Minju Joson on Tuesday says in a bylined commentary:
					
					 This goes to prove that the Japanese reactionaries are making desperate efforts to completely turn SDF into an independent force for a war of aggression like the U.S. forces.
					
					 Their ultimate goal is to hold military hegemony in Asia, the commentary notes, adding that their scenario is to regain their position as "leader of Asia" backed by the strong military muscle at any cost and not to rule out even a war to carry it out.
					
					 It is not secret that the basic mission of the U.S. Marines is to destroy the targets and major objects, wipe out military forces in various regions of the world including Asia-Pacific region and Indian Ocean and seize and put under military control coastal areas and areas in the depth. It is as clear as daylight that the new marines which Japan is going to build will have the same mission and duty as the U.S. Marines.
					
					 This means that SDF is no longer forces for the defence of the country but will emerge war forces whose mission will be to launch preemptive attacks on other countries and invade them. 
					
					 The projected emergence of a war state in Asia cannot but be a very dangerous development in view of world peace and security.
					
					 Japan's moves for militarism and war should be regarded as dangerous and checked.
					
					 Japan would be well advised to bear in mind that a war will bring it nothing but destruction.

articles.title: Actions for Protecting Peace against War Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Actions for Protecting Peace against War Called for in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Democracy, People's Life, Peaceful Reunification and Sovereignty of south Korea made public an appeal on October 4 calling for a struggle against the moves of the south Korean puppet regime to ignite a new war and actions to protect peace.
					 The appeal accused the bellicose forces of stepping up the arms build-up and war drills, while introducing MRAPs and high-performance helicopters by spending a stupendous amount of funds.
					
					 A touch-and-go situation is prevailing on the Korean Peninsula due to the present regime's policy for escalating confrontation, it noted, adding:
					
					 It is the only way of defusing the danger of a war and preserving peace on the Korean Peninsula to implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration. 
					
					 Only when all the people turn out in the struggle to protect peace against war, will a phase of reunification and prosperity be opened on the peninsula.
					
					 The nation should not allow a war disaster to be imposed upon it, the appeal noted, calling on all people to pool their efforts to smash the war moves of the Lee Myung Bak regime and protect peace.

articles.title: Overseas Koreans' Organization Slams Outbursts of S. Korean Warmongers
articles.content:
Overseas Koreans' Organization Slams Outbursts of S. Korean Warmongers
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- The Secretariat of the General Association of Koreans in China issued a statement on October 2 under the title of "The group of traitors like Jong Sung Jo and Kim Kwan Jin will never be able to escape severe punishment by all Koreans."
					 Jong Sung Jo, chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff of the south Korean puppet army, blustered that "the possibility of provocation by the north still exists" and Kim Kwan Jin, "minister of Defense" of south Korea, vociferated about "the possibility of provocation in the way of trumpeting in the east and attacking the west" and "the provocation similar to 'Cheonan' warship sinking case", the statement recalled, adding:
					
					 What the war maniacs cried is nothing but brazen-faced and ridiculous remarks to justify their forces' intrusion into the territorial waters of the north in the West Sea of Korea.
					
					 Lee Myung Bak steeped in sycophancy towards the U.S. and Japan to the marrow of his bones eagerly asked Japan to wait for some time when it betrayed its intention to grab Tok Islets, inalienable part of the nation's territory, while running amuck like a rabid dog to stifle compatriots. Such human dreg is rare to be found in the world.
					
					We Koreans in China will breathe the same breath and keep pace with all service personnel and people at home all out in the advance and wage a devoted struggle for the prosperity of the homeland and national reunification, with the great illustrious brilliant commander of Mt. Paektu at the helm of the revolution, the statement stressed.

articles.title: Koreans' Organization in China Denounces "Yusin Constitution"
articles.content:
Koreans' Organization in China Denounces "Yusin Constitution" 
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- A spokesman of the General Association of Koreans in China issued a statement titled "'Yusin Constitution' is a fascist law for one party dictatorship" on Sept. 27. 
					 The statement recalled that Ri Yong Hun, former chief justice of south Korea, on Sept. 22 said the "Yusin Constitution" paved the way for one party dictatorship by abusing the "constitution". 
					
					 The south Korean ultra-right conservative group made up of diehard pro-U.S., pro-Japanese elements is staging a foolish farce of embellishing fascist dictator Park Chung-Hee, touching off indignation among Koreans, it said, and went on:
					
					 Traitor Park Chung-Hee mercilessly suppressed, punished and killed many pro-reunification patriots and other people for 18 years of his rule, turning south Korea into a tundra of human rights and a huge hell on earth ridden with horrible fascist tyranny. 
					
					 Fascist Park committed too many atrocities against the people to be pardoned. 
					
					 The "yusin" specter is now reviving in south Korea to turn back the wheel of history, the statement warned, adding: 
					
					 South Koreans of different social standings are becoming more vocal denouncing the conservative group for embellishing the May 16 military coup and "yusin" dictatorship. 
					
					 With the approach of October 17, the day when the "Yusin Constitution" was cooked up, south Koreans are intensifying their actions to check and frustrate the attempt of the pro-U.S. forces to stay in power and renewing their will to stir up their enthusiasm in the up-coming "presidential election". 
					
					 The General Association of Koreans in China and all Koreans in China fully support the just struggle of the south Korean people against the attempt of the pro-U.S. dictatorial forces to stay in power.

articles.title: Koreans' Organization in U.S. Commemorates Anniversary of October 4 Declaration
articles.content:
Koreans' Organization in U.S. Commemorates Anniversary of October 4 Declaration 
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Federation of Koreans in the U.S. made public a statement on Oct. 5 on the occasion of the fifth anniversary of the October 4 declaration. 
					 The statement said that the October 4 declaration is a precious one guaranteeing national reunification, peace and prosperity as a programme for implementing the June 15 joint declaration. 
					
					 The declaration has not been implemented though five years passed since its adoption owing to the traitorous and anti-reunification moves of the Lee Myung Bak regime of south Korea, it noted, and went on:
					
					 Although temporary difficulties lie in the way of reunification, they can never quell the desire of the nation for independent and peaceful reunification. 
					
					 It is necessary to put an end to the military hostile relations between the north and the south and establish a peace-keeping regime by fully implementing the declaration. 
					
					 We will brand the group keen to escalate confrontation with fellow countrymen and ignite a war as the enemy of the nation and mete out a stern punishment to it. 
					
					 Koreans in the U.S. will struggle in unity with all compatriots at home and overseas who support the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and are ready to implement them to the last.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Published in Uruguay
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Published in Uruguay
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- The work of President Kim Il Sung "10-Point Programme of the Great Unity of the Whole Nation for the Reunification of the Country" was brought out in pamphlet by La Juventud Publishing House of Uruguay on Oct. 1.
					 The work, published on April 6, 1993, comprehensively indicates the ways of achieving the great national unity including the need for all Koreans to unite on the basis of patriotism and the spirit of national independence, the issue of promoting co-existence, co-prosperity and common interests, stopping all political strives fostering division and confrontation among fellow countrymen and building confidence and achieving unity between the north and the south.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Russia
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) --General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "The Workers' Party of Korea Is the Party of the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung" was published in booklet by the Nakhodka Format Publishing House of Russia.
					 A book releasing ceremony was held on Sept. 27. It was attended by personages of the Nakhodka City Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation and masses.
					
					 Zelenov, first secretary of the Nakhodka City Committee of the CPRF, said at the ceremony that his work serves as a guiding principle showing how to inherit the preceding leaders' exploits in party building and activities and an excellent textbook for learning from the experience of the Workers' Party of Korea in party building.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Lauded by Foreign Papers
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Lauded by Foreign Papers
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Foreign papers carried special write-ups to mark the 15th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's election  as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the 67th anniversary of the WPK. 
					 The Russian paper Nakhodkinski Rabochi on Sept. 27 carried an article illustrated with a portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il and a photo of the dear respected Kim Jong Un inspecting a unit of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 The paper in an article entitled "Comrade Kim Jong Il is the eternal general secretary of WPK" gave a detailed account of the fact that the army and people of the DPRK holding Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the general secretary of the party worked world-startling and history-making miracles in defending socialism and building a thriving nation.
					
					 This year the Korean people acclaimed him as eternal general secretary of the WPK.
					
					 They entirely entrust their destiny and future to the WPK led by Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The Indian newspaper Defence and Humanity on Oct. 1 dedicated one whole page to a special write-up accompanied with a photo of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The Bangladeshi paper Ekota on Oct. 1 and the Pakistani paper Baluchistan Times on Sept. 30 in articles praised the glorious history of the WPK leading the Korean revolution along the road of victory.

articles.title: Korean Film Shows Held Abroad
articles.content:
Korean Film Shows Held Abroad 
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Korean film shows took place in Benin, Indonesia, Thailand and at the Secretariat of the Pan-African Movement on October 2 on the occasion of the 15th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the 67th anniversary of the WPK.
					 They were attended by public figures and masses of relevant countries and a regional organization.
					
					 The participants of the film shows watched "Fireworks for a Thriving Nation", "Party Founding Memorial Tower", "Pyongyang at Night" and other Korean films.
					
					 The rector of Cotonou Institute of Journalism of Benin who is also  chief of the Benin Group for the Study of Kimilsungism and Kimjongilism said it was the plan of Kim Jong Il to build a thriving socialist nation and it has now become a goal of activities of the WPK.
					
					 All fields including education in the DPRK have greeted a heyday in their all-round development, cities and villages have turned into a socialist fairyland and a firm foundation has been laid to enable the people to fully enjoy wealth and prosperity under socialism, he noted, adding: This is ascribable to the outstanding leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The chairman of the Benin-Korea Amicable Association "Long Live General Kim Jong Il, Supreme Leader" who is also chairman of the Benin National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea said the WPK headed by the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un would lead the DPRK to shed more brilliant rays.

articles.title: WPK's Anniversary Commemorated in Bangladesh
articles.content:
WPK's Anniversary Commemorated in Bangladesh
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- The Bangladesh-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Committee issued a bulletin on Oct. 3 in commemoration of the 67th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The bulletin said in an article titled "67th anniversary of the WPK":
					
					 The WPK founded on Oct. 10, 1945 made sure that all democratic reforms including agrarian reform and nationalization of major industries were successfully carried out. 
					
					 It also developed the DPRK into a socialist industrial state in a matter of 14 years by leading all people to bring about a great revolutionary surge.
					
					 The Korean people under the leadership of the WPK not only safeguarded socialism in the worst adversity but laid a springboard for building a thriving nation.
					
					 The WPK is arousing all people to a gigantic drive for the building of a thriving nation.
					
					 67 years covered by the WPK represent a history of victory and glory in which it has brought about epoch-making changes by leading the people.

articles.title: Anniversary of October 4 Declaration Marked in India, Malaysia
articles.content:
Anniversary of October 4 Declaration Marked in India, Malaysia 
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- There took place diverse events in foreign countries on Oct. 1 and 2 on the occasion of the fifth anniversary of the October 4 declaration. 
					 They include lectures, seminars, photo exhibitions and film shows held by the Indian Working Women Society for Study of the Juche Philosophy, the Indian Intellectuals' Society for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Malaysian HVT Tourist Agency and other companies in Malaysia.
					
					 The participants in the film shows watched DPRK films such as "Arms of DPRK".
					
					 Present at those events were people from all walks of life in those countries.
					
					 The chairman of the Indian Working Women Society for Study of the Juche Philosophy noted in his lecture that a north-south summit was provided for the first time in the history of national division in June 2000 and it resulted in the adoption of the June 15 joint declaration, a milestone of Korea's reunification.
					
					 In order to further advance the June 15 era of reunification, Kim Jong Il, chairman of the National Defence Commission, provided another north-south summit in Oct. 2007 which culminated in the adoption of the October 4 declaration, a programme for implementing the June 15 joint declaration, the chairman noted.
					
					 He recalled that a stumbling block was laid in the movement for Korea's reunification due to the south Korean authorities' anti-reunification acts of totally negating the inter-Korean joint declarations. 
					
					 The manager of the Malaysian HVT Tourist Agency said that when the October 4 declaration was published, not only the Korean people but also all other people of the world wished to see Korea reunified as one.
					
					 However, traitor Lee Myung Bak of south Korea totally denied the joint declarations after coming to power, driving the inter-Korean relations to a collapse, he noted.
					
					 The Korean people are sure to achieve national reunification under the wise leadership of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un, he stressed.

articles.title: October 4 Declaration Supported by Foreign Figures
articles.content:
October 4 Declaration Supported by Foreign Figures 
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Thai and Swedish Figures released statements on Oct. 1 and 2 on the occasion of the fifth anniversary of the October 4 declaration.
					 Chanai Longoen, chairman of the Thailand-DPRK Friendship Association, noted that the declaration clearly indicates practical ways to achieve national unity and reunification.
					
					 He said:
					
					 As soon as the declaration was published, the Korean people and other peace-loving and progressive people of the world fully supported and hailed it. They unanimously wished to see the declaration successfully implemented to develop the inter-Korean relations into reconciliation, cooperation, peace and prosperity.
					
					 However, the present south Korean "government" authorities totally denied the declaration and reacted to it with their confrontation policy, large-scale joint military drills and state-sponsored politically-motivated terrorism.
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the Korean people, clarified that the Workers' Party of Korea and the government of the DPRK would join hands with anyone who sincerely wants the reunification of the country and the peace and prosperity of the nation, and is now leading the cause of reunification.
					
					 He expressed the belief that Korea would be reunified without fail in accordance with the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo.
					
					 Christer Lundgren, chairman of the Sweden-Korea Friendship Association, said that the October 4 declaration provided by General Secretary Kim Jong Il injected fresh vitality into the Korean people struggling for national reunification.
					
					 Prosperity, peace and reunification of the Korean nation can be achieved only when the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration are respected and implemented.

articles.title: Bangladeshi Political Party Leader Supports Korean People in Effort for National Reunification
articles.content:
Bangladeshi Political Party Leader Supports Korean People in Effort for National Reunification 
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Dilip Barua, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Bangladesh (Marxist－Leninist), met with Sin Hung Chol, DPRK ambassador to Bangladesh, on Oct. 4.
					 The general secretary said:
					
					 The Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) developed into an invincible party thanks to President Kim Il Sung's idea of party building and his wise leadership.
					
					 It is the greatest feat of General Secretary Kim Jong Il that he built the WPK into a guiding force of the Songun revolution.
					
					 His idea and cause of party building is being successfully carried forward by Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 The October 4 declaration is absolutely supported by the Korean nation as it is an action programme for thoroughly implementing the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 I extend support and solidarity to the party and people of the DPRK in their struggle to independently reunify the country with concerted efforts of the Korean nation in line with the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.

articles.title: Feats of Peerlessly Great Men Lauded by Russian Political Figures
articles.content:
Feats of Peerlessly Great Men Lauded by Russian Political Figures 
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Russian political party delegations paid congratulatory visits to the DPRK mission on Sept. 27 and Oct. 3 on the occasions of the 15th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and the 67th anniversary of the Party.
					 They were the delegations of the Maritime Territorial Branch of the United Russia Party and the Maritime Territorial Branch of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation.
					
					 The members of the delegations placed floral baskets and bunches of flowers before the full-length painting of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il standing together.
					
					 Lovoda, secretary of the Political Council of the Nakhodka Branch of the United Russia Party, said:
					
					 I extend warm congratulations to Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, on the occasion of the 67th anniversary of the Party.
					
					 The Party covered only the path of victory under the experienced leadership of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and it is working fresh miracles in revolution and construction having Kim Jong Un at its top post.
					
					 I sincerely wish the Party more shining successes in building a thriving nation.
					
					 Zelenov, first secretary of the Nakhodka City Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, noted:
					
					 It was a great event of historic significance in the independent nation-building that Kim Il Sung founded the Workers' Party of Korea, the headquarters of the Korean revolution, right after Korea's liberation.
					
					 Thanks to Kim Jong Il's tested leadership, the Party became ever-victorious.
					
					 The people of the DPRK entirely entrust their destiny and future to the Party, calling it mother party, and they are now all out in the effort for implementing the line and polices of the Party.
					
					 The Party is dynamically stepping up the building of an economic power, firmly maintaining independence in any storm and stress.

articles.title: Bangladeshi Figure Congratulates WPK on Its Birthday
articles.content:
Bangladeshi Figure Congratulates WPK on Its Birthday 
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Garib Newaz, president of the Bangladesh People's League, made public a statement on Oct. 4 on the occasion of the 67th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 He said:
					
					 We extend warm congratulations to the WPK and the heroic people of the DPRK.
					
					 The WPK founded by President Kim Il Sung performed great feats, leading the struggle of the Korean people as headquarters of the revolution.
					
					 The President led the WPK to successfully perform its mission and role as a guiding force, holding fast to the Juche idea as a guiding idea of revolution.
					
					 The Korean people under the leadership of the Party are honorably defending the sovereignty and dignity of the country and accelerating the building of a thriving nation, courageously meeting all challenges of the imperialists.
					
					 We are confident that the WPK will register greater successes under the leadership of Kim Jong Un and extend full support and solidarity to the Party and people of the DPRK in their just cause.

articles.title: CDN publica declaracion sobre nueva "politica de misil" del Sur de Corea
articles.content:
CDN publica declaracion sobre nueva "politica de misil" del Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 9 de octubre (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hizo publica el dia 9 la siguiente declaracion:
					Pese a la gran preocupacion y rechazo de los nacionales y extranjeros, los titeres surcoreanos, que habian debatido largo tiempo con su amo gringo la "enmienda de la orientacion sobre el misil", publicaron por fin el dia 7 la llamada "declaracion de la politica de misil".
					
					Segun el fundamento de esa "declaracion", el alcance de misiles de los titeres surcoreanos se alargara desde 300 a 800 kilometros para poder atacar toda la extension de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y el peso de sus ojivas se aumentara, en casos necesarios, a mas de 500 kilogramos, el peso actual, para intensificar las operaciones de exterminio.
					
					Ademas, se suministraran a los titeres nuevos drones letales con 2.5 toneladas de peso y 300 kilometros de distancia de navegacion. 
					
					Ahora, las figuras oficiales de Chongwadae y del Ministerio de Defensa Nacional titere del Sur de Corea hablan con bombo y platillo de que la nueva "declaracion de la politica de misil" posibilita disuadir suficientemente la "amenaza" y la "provocacion" de alguien y que sus misiles pueden influenciar no solo en toda la extension geografica norcoreana sino hasta en el Nordeste de China y el Lejano Oriente de Rusia, aunque fueran lanzados desde la parte central del territorio surcoreano como Taejon. 
					
					Esta "declaracion", que segun los titeres, es el "exito mas grande" conseguido de EE.UU. en los ultimos anos, es nuevo producto de la confabulacion entre el amo gringo y sus lacayos surcoreanos para desatar en cualquier momento la guerra de agresion al Norte de Corea llevando constantemente al extremo la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					La "declaracion" en cuestion fue inventada porque la Casa Blanca acepto la solicitud de Chongwadae, los Departamentos de Defensa y de Estado de EE.UU. admitieron la peticion de los ministerios homologos del Sur de Corea y el presidente Obama consintio el ruego del traidor Lee Myung Bak.
					
					  Segun trascendidos, Lee Myung Bak suplico al presidente Obama el alargamiento del alcance de sus misiles en decenas de ocasiones, incluso en julio del ano pasado y en marzo del ano en curso. 
					
					  En cuanto se publico la "declaracion de la politica de misil", la administracion Obama expresa la posicion oficial de aplaudir a los titeres surcoreanos diciendo que es una "respuesta mas equilibrada y certera" y "medida absolutamente racional". 
					
					  Con respecto a la situacion creada, el Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea expone al interior y exterior la siguiente posicion de principios: 
					
					Primero, puesto que se hizo mas evidente la politica hostil de EE.UU. sobre la RPDC a traves de la "declaracion de la politica de misil" de los titeres surcoreanos, nuestro ejercito y pueblo mantendran la consigna "!Aniquilad a los agresores imperialistas norteamericanos, enemigos jurados del pueblo coreano!" y lucharan hasta el final por ponerla en practica. 
					
					  Hasta hace poco, el presidente estadounidense Obama habia expuesto oficialmente la posicion de convivir pacificamente con la RPDC. Tambien lo hizo la secretaria de Estado Hillary a traves de los medios de prensa. Y los elaboradores claves de la politica del Consejo de Seguridad Nacional y la Agencia Central de Inteligencia de EE.UU., que se han reunido con nuestros funcionarios en ocasiones oficiales y extraoficiales, afirmaron tambien que no hay la politica de hostilidad a la RPDC. 
					
					  Pero, la realidad muestra que todos esos mensajes de EE.UU. son mentiras puras. 
					
					  Dado que se torna cada dia mas clara la politica de hostilidad a la RPDC de EE.UU., los militares y civiles coreanos se mantienen en la invariable posicion de no parar ni un momento la guerra antiyanqui para aniquilar al enemigo jurado que causo de siglo en siglo incontables sufrimientos al pueblo coreano. 
					
					  En la contienda antiyanqui no podran buscar refugio los titeres surcoreanos que acostumbrados al servilismo y sumision a grandes potencias, se mueven a ciegas para satisfacer la ambicion agresiva de su amo. 
					
					Segundo, puesto que bajo la instigacion de su amo norteamericano, los titeres surcoreanos intentan atacar todo el territorio de la RPDC con los misiles, el ejercito y el pueblo de esta fortaleceran por todos los medios la disposicion militar frente a ello.
					
					No ocultamos que el poderoso ejercito revolucionario del monte Paektu, incluyendo las fuerzas coheteriles estrategicas, ha colocado en la mira de su golpe certero el nido de los titeres surcoreanos, las bases de las tropas norteamericanas ocupantes de la mitad del sagrado territorio patrio, Japon, la isla Guam y hasta el territorio norteamericano.
					
					Estamos preparados perfectamente para responder a las armas nucleares y misiles de EE.UU. y sus satelites como los titeres surcoreanos con los mismos armamentos.
					
					Lo unico que hace falta es la accion resuelta de la RPDC.
					
					Hacerles probar la guerra de verdad, que no conoce todavia ni puede imaginar el mundo, he aqui la ferrea voluntad de nuestro ejercito y pueblo.
					
					Tercero, aprovechando esta oportunidad, exhortamos a todos los gobiernos, partidos politicos, entidades y los habitantes pacifistas del mundo, que aman la justicia y simpatizan con la verdad, a elevar la vigilancia a las arbitrariedades de EE.UU..
					
					La "declaracion de la politica de misil" no es la simple orientacion sobre el alargamiento del alcance de misiles.
					
					Ella parte del siniestro intento dominacionista de EE.UU. de formar el cerco estrategico al continente asiatico, destruir la paz y la estabilidad de esta region y establecer asi la "esfera de dominio de EE.UU." sobre la region de Asia-Pacifico.
					
					Todavia numerosas personas del mundo no calan la artimana y las arbitrariedades de EE.UU. que hubo detras de los incidentes de Iraq, Afganistan, Libia y Siria.
					
					Ahora es el tiempo en que se debe elevar la vigilancia a las arbitrariedades de EE.UU. y levantarse en la lucha por frustrarlas.
					
					No debe olvidar ni un momento que el chacal nunca se convierte en oveja.
					
					El ejercito y el pueblo de la RPDC, lucharan firmemente en el futuro tambien por realizar la reunificacion del pais y la independencia del mundo levantando la bandera de la lucha antiyanqui y anti-titeres surcoreanos.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia mensajes de respuesta a jefes de partido y Estado
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia mensajes de respuesta a jefes de partido y Estado
Pyongyang, 9 de octubre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, remitio los mensajes de respuesta a los jefes de partido y Estado de varios paises quienes le enviaron los mensajes en felicitacion del 64o aniversario de la fundacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					Entre los destinatarios se distinguen el Secretario General del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de China, Presidente de la Republica Popular China y Presidente de la Comision Militar Central de la RPCh, el presidente del Comite Permanente de la Asamblea Popular Nacional de la RPCh, el primer ministro del Consejo de Estado de la RPCh, el Primer Secretario del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de Cuba y Presidente de los Consejos de Estado y de Ministros de la Republica de Cuba, el presidente de Nepal, el secretario general del Comite Central del Partido Popular Revolucionario Lao y presidente de la Republica Democratica Popular Lao, los presidente de la Republica de Libano, de la Republica de las Maldivas, de la Union de Myanmar, de Mongolia, el rey de Reino de Bahrein, el presidente de la Republica Popular de Bangladesh, el de la Republica Arabe de Siria, el de la Republica Democratica Socialista de Sri Lanka, el rey del Reino de Camboya, el emir y el premier 
					
					 del Estado de Kuwait, el rey del Reino de Tailandia, el presidente del Estado de Palestina, presidente del Comite Ejecutivo de la Organizacion de Liberacion Palestina y jefe de la Autoridad Nacional de Palestina, el emir y el premier y ministro de RR.EE. del Estado de Qatar, el presidente de la Republica de Chipre, el de la Republica de Tadjikistan, el de Turkmenistan, el de la Republica de Armenia, el de la Republica de Azerbaiyan, el emir del Sultanato Oman, el rey del Reino Hachemita de Jordania, el presidente de la Republica de Indonesia, el de la Republica de la India, el de la Republica de Yemen, el de la Republica de Grecia, el de la Republica de Malta, el de la Republica de Belarus, el de la Republica de Portugal, los regentes de la Republica de San Marino, el rey del Reino de Espana, el presidente de la Republica de Guinea, el de la Republica de Namibia, el de la Republica Federal de Nigeria, el comandante en jefe de las fuerzas armadas del mismo pais, el presidente
					
					  de la Republica de Rwanda, el premier del Reino de Lesotho, el presidente de la Republica de Mali, el de la Republica de Mozambique, el de la Republica Democratica de Sao Tome y Principe, el de la Republica de Sudan, el de la Republica de Sierra Leona, el de la Republica de Senegal, el de la Republica de Seychelles, el de la Republica de Guinea Ecuatorial, el presidente y el jefe de Estado de la Republica Centroafricana, el presidente de la Republica de Zimbabwe, el presidente y el jefe de Estado de la Republica de Chad, el presidente de la Republica de Kenia, el de la Republica Unida de Tanzania, el de la Republica Federal Islamica de las Comores, el de la Republica de Cote d´Ivoire, el de la Republica del Congo, el de la Republica del Congo Democratico, el de la Republica de Togo, el de la Republica Tunecina, el de la Republica Argelina Democratica y Popular, el de la Republica de Angola, el de la Republica de Uganda, el de la Republica Arabe de Egipto, el de la Re
					
					 publica Federal Democratica de Etiopia y el de la Republica de Surinam.
					
					Tambien figuran el secretario general de la ONU, el secretario general del Consejo del Premio Internacional Kim Il Sung y director general del Instituto Internacional de la Idea Juche, el codirector general de la Fundacion                    Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il y el secretario general del Instituto Internacional de la Idea Juche. 
					
					En sus misivas el Mariscal expreso profundo agradecimiento por haberle enviado calurosas felicitaciones. 
					
					Y manifesto la conviccion de que seguiran fortaleciendose favorablemente las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre la RPDC y los paises respectivos y les deseo a los destinatarios exitos en sus trabajos.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de presidente sirio
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de presidente sirio
Pyongyang, 9 de octubre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, recibio el mensaje de felicitacion que le remitiera el dia 7 Bashar al-Assad, secretario regional del Partido Socialista del Resurgimiento Arabes (BAAS) y presidente de la Republica Arabe de Siria.
					La misiva va como sigue:
					
					Para mi es un gran placer enviarle a Vd. y a su amistoso pueblo la mas sincera felicitacion en nombre del pueblo arabe de Siria y en el mio propio con motivo del 67o aniversario de la fundacion del PTC y deseo a Vd. buena salud y al pueblo coreano el mayor progreso y prosperidad.
					
					Aprovecho esta oportunidad para manifestar la conviccion de que las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre la Republica Arabe de Siria y la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea seguiran intensificandose conforme a los intereses de los pueblos de nuestros dos paises amistosos.

articles.title: Inaugurados parques de atracciones de Mangyongdae y Taesongsan
articles.content:
Inaugurados parques de atracciones de Mangyongdae y Taesongsan
Pyongyang, 9 de octubre (ACNC) -- Quedaron reconstruidos como lugares de descanso cultural del pueblo los parques de atracciones de Mangyongdae y de Taesongsan con motivo del 67o aniversario de la fundacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					El Parque de Atracciones de Mangyongdae y el de Taesongsan, construidos gracias a la gran benevolencia de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il, fueron remozados como creaciones monumentales de la epoca por el noble amor al pueblo del Mariscal Kim Jong Un quien concede prioridad al interes y al confort del pueblo.
					
					Los actos de inauguracion tuvieron lugar este martes en los respectivos parques.
					
					Participaron en las ocasiones Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim, Choe Ryong Hae y otros cuadros, los funcionarios de los ministerios, organos centrales y de ramas interesadas, los constructores militares, los empleados de la empresa de administracion de los equipos de diversion y los trabajadores capitalinos.
					
					En el acto efectuado en el Parque de Atracciones de Mangyongdae, el vicemariscal del EPC Choe Ryong Hae, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y jefe de la Direccion Politica General del Ejercito Popular de Corea, pronuncio la palabra de la ocasion.
					
					Choe Ryong Hae dijo que el parque acondicionado excelentemente es la creacion monumental creada por la abnegada direccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, quien posee las nobles concepciones de la patria, el pueblo y el futuro, y el espiritu de materializar a muerte las orientaciones del partido y la fidelidad patriotica del ejercito revolucionario infinitamente fiel al llamamiento del partido.
					
					Senalo que los funcionarios y empleados de la empresa de administracion del parque deben registrar viraje revolucionario en el mantenimiento del parque y contribuir a que los trabajadores disfruten su descanso en el lugar mediante el chequeo tecnico de los equipos.
					
					El vicemariscal Kim Jong Gak, miembro del Buro Politico del CC del PTC y ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, pronuncio la palabra inaugural del Parque de Atracciones de Taesongsan.
					
					El orador puntualizo que el parque de Taesongsan constituye otra creacion monumental en que se materializo con brillantez el noble proposito de amar al pueblo del PTC.
					
					Agrego que la reconstruccion tuvo lugar manteniendo el caracter peculiar del parque situado en el monte Taesong y satisfaciendo la demanda de la vida cultural del pueblo.
					
					Con la reconstruccion excelente del parque, se puso de pleno manifiesto el verdadero aspecto del socialismo al estilo coreano que avanza hacia el mundo y a la realizacion del maximo ideal del pueblo, y el pueblo coreano puede disfrutar una vida cultural mas rica.
					
					Terminados los actos, los participantes recorrieron los parques.

articles.title: EnPyongyang la delegacion de Kyodo
articles.content:
EnPyongyang la delegacion de Kyodo 
Pyongyang, 9 de octubre (ACNC) -- Arribo el dia 9 a esta capital la delegacion de la agencia noticiera Kyodo de Japon encabezada por su presidente Satoshi Ishikawa.
					  La acogio en el aeropuerto el subdirector general de la Agencia Central de Noticia de Corea, Chon Il.
